name: The Bench (Lucas Ballard, 8BitHypocrite, The Art Guy, BrokenHawk)
name_original: The Bench (Lucas Ballard, 8BitHypocrite, The Art Guy, BrokenHawk)
description:
The world is broken.

It's guardians brought low by shadow.

Save this mysterious world remembering that no one is ever alone.

Cody Bruckerhoff - Programmer

Mason Scheible - Sound Design

Gregory Burns : Artist

Lucas Ballard : Writer

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2 following the the theme "You're Not Alone"
